OrinJournalist_17.text: You shed your secrets so easily. No matter - your clumsy purpose is clear enough already.

OrinJournalist_86.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Orin
OrinJournalist_86.text: Gortash knows you are coming. Knows you have the Bone Lord's stone. Do not let him hiss hot air into your worm-weakened brain.
OrinJournalist_86.context: NodeContext: Acting like she's helping you, but just trying to freak you out. 'Bone Lord's stone' is Ketheric's netherstone

OrinJournalist_49.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Orin
OrinJournalist_49.text: Remember - his throat spits lies, but my blade carves the truth. You will read it on your skin soon enough.
OrinJournalist_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin twists her ring and disappears.NodeContext: toying with the player, knows the 'truth' about them and is enjoying holding this against them

OrinJournalist_51.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Orin
OrinJournalist_51.text: You think I can't sniff the secrets hidden in your pretty skull? What you seek. What you need.

OrinJournalist_10.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_10.text: Be as water. Move as a river - strike like a tsunami. I will drown this fetid cult.

OrinJournalist_81.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_81.text: I hardly want my strategy printed all over the front pages, do I?

OrinJournalist_90.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_90.text: Perhaps it could inspire some like-minded citizens to help your cause.

OrinJournalist_39.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_39.text: I've had enough. This interview's over.

OrinJournalist_42.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_42.text: Don't worry. I already have everything I need.
OrinJournalist_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: Ominous

OrinJournalist_74.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_74.text: I offered him a chance at redemption. When he refused to take it, he left me no choice.

OrinJournalist_46.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_46.text: So you were forced to kill him? What a tragic story.
OrinJournalist_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

OrinJournalist_60.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_60.text: Unfortunately, Absolutists rarely seem interested in compromise.

OrinJournalist_38.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_38.text: Ketheric's hubris was his downfall. I was merely the catalyst.

OrinJournalist_34.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_34.text: I'm sure you were much more than that. You proved to be quite the thorn in his side.
OrinJournalist_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

OrinJournalist_84.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_84.text: His Absolutist friends can't be very happy with you.

OrinJournalist_15.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_15.text: I ground his bones to dust. Even his god could not save him.

OrinJournalist_27.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_27.text: Defying the gods themselves? I had no idea.
OrinJournalist_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

OrinJournalist_50.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_50.text: Taking out one of the Absolute's generals was no mean feat. You must feel confident for the battles ahead.

OrinJournalist_29.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_29.text: I drowned him in a darkness older and more profound than any he claimed to command.

OrinJournalist_100.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_100.text: Sorry, I'm saving that story for my memoirs.

OrinJournalist_76.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_76.text: Then consider this a taste of what's to come. You must be able to share something about Ketheric's downfall?

OrinJournalist_9.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_9.text: Consider me an emissary of my people.

OrinJournalist_87.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_87.text: And a noble and powerful people they must be, to be represented by one of your impressive experience.

OrinJournalist_80.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_80.text: I need to return to some... colleagues, let's call them. They're expecting me.

OrinJournalist_57.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_57.text: Returning to the fold with plenty of tales to tell, I'm sure. Not least about your adventures in the shadow-cursed lands.
OrinJournalist_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

OrinJournalist_98.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_98.text: I have... family business to attend to.

OrinJournalist_28.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_28.text: And any family would be proud to have such a son representing them. Especially after your exploits in the shadow-cursed lands.

OrinJournalist_64.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_64.text: A portentous arrival then. Your inheritance awaits - one you feel you've earned ten times over, I don't doubt.

OrinJournalist_85.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_85.text: Look, I'm going to write this piece with or without your input. It'll be much more accurate if you answer my questions.

OrinJournalist_93.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_93.text: You must have some plans once you enter the city?

OrinJournalist_88.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_88.text: You, of course. News travels fast in this city, and after your exploits, you're quite the celebrity. This interview will be our biggest issue yet.

OrinJournalist_62.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_62.text: Quickly, then. I've urgent business in the city.

OrinJournalist_102.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_102.text: And I wouldn't dream of keeping you from it.

OrinJournalist_79.speaker: Player
OrinJournalist_79.text: Where to begin... Well, I was born the year of a poor harvest...

OrinJournalist_6.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_6.text: Let me stop you there. We'll need to be a bit more focused. Word counts, you know.

OrinJournalist_59.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_59.text: How about I ask a few questions, and you just tell me the first thing that comes into your head?

OrinJournalist_92.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Journalist
OrinJournalist_92.text: You don't trust journalists? I'm not like the others - your words are safe with me.
